name: semantic-tagging-vscode
description: Understand your code's intent with semantic tags

semanticTagging.enableTelemetry.description: ðŸ“Š We track tag types, not code. Enable to help improve pattern detection (fully anonymous)

semanticTagging.telemetryHost.description: PostHog host URL (use your self-hosted instance or default cloud)

semanticTagging.telemetryApiKey.description: Custom PostHog API key for self-hosted instances (leave empty to use COSCA's default)

semanticTagging.analysis.confidenceThres.description: Minimum confidence threshold for semantic tag detection

semanticTagging.analysis.maxFileSize.description: Maximum file size in bytes for semantic analysis (1MB default)

semanticTagging.analysis.debounceDelay.description: Delay in milliseconds before analyzing file changes

semanticTagging.analysis.maxCacheSize.description: Maximum number of files to cache analysis results for

semanticTagging.telemetry.batchSize.description: Number of telemetry events to batch before sending

semanticTagging.telemetry.flushInterval.description: Interval in milliseconds to flush telemetry batches

semanticTagging.performance.maxAnalysisT.description: Maximum time in milliseconds for semantic analysis before timeout

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
scripts.dev:protected: npm run security:protect && npm run compile
